Articles.Content:
Hello! I'm Templar. I've been playing Kerbal Space Program for about a year now. My name, in real life, is James. 

I decided to get used to the forums, as the 1.0 version of KSP has been released ( \o/ ).

If the people here, in this wonderful community, could please direct me to all of the important threads/sections of these forums, I would be very grateful. 

Thanks!

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-30T22:52:51Z" title="04/30/2015 10:52  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 30, 2015</time> by diomedea**
  
deleting sensible private info
Welcome aboard! Watch your back, though... I'm an Assassin... c:<

The threads and sections that are important depend on what you're looking for. What did you have in mind? [Here's](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/28352-The-Drawing-Board-A-library-of-tutorials-and-other-useful-information?highlight=drawing+board)a guide to guides and tutorials, though keep in mind that many will have been rendered obsolete by 1.0's release.
Greetings! Check out the many cool videos over in [Live from Mission Control](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/forums/53-Live-from-Mission-Control%21)!
